channel.title: I cant find run.bat in my newly downloaded 508 sources! Help please!
channel.description: Hey i got a 508 server problem. I downloaded some 508 sources and 508 client. I have the cache and everything. But i cant run the server because theres no run.bat in noone of the sources i downloaded!!! Help pleaseeeee

item.title: I cant find run.bat in my newly downloaded 508 sources! Help please!
item.dc:creator: @RS_Gamer001 RS Gamer001
item.description:
@RS_Gamer001 wrote:

prachy:

when i click on run.bat it says “The System cannot find the path is specified.”

Right-Click run.bat and click edit… see the jdk16.1.6_##? Change the two #'s to your version of JDK, to find out goto C:/ProgramFiles/ and look for the folder called (Without these things: ") “Java” you should see it!

Sorry, if it didn’t work I wasn’t doing it when I was typing it… I should add this to tutorials for… nubie’s… like you. ;D

Read full topic
item.source: I cant find run.bat in my newly downloaded 508 sources! Help please!
